publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: Looks like now it's peaceful again
Like an old familiar song refrain
we're back on lane
No dark clouds or blizzards in sight
Rainy days has turned to quiet nights
We're safe and tight
All of us are happy again
Looks like now it is our happy end
brightly painted scene again
Though these days might not stay the same
Let's enjoy this happy end for now
Brightly painted scene
for now
Sometimes we're not fully aware
We just might not know
when we get there
it's so unfair
All the times it slipped from our hands
squandering the days of happy ends
brightly painted scene again
though this days might vanish away
let's enjoy this happy day for now
brightly painted scene
for now
